data.actual_result: Your 'empty' characters are deleted System settings: Windows 10 Pro, Latest Canary 0.0.149
data.expected_result: Your exact message draft should carry over to the upload dialouge
data.short_description: 'Empty' Characters such as New Lines and Spaces do not carry over to the Upload Dialouge
data.steps_to_repro: - Type your message in the message field, put a Space or New Line at the end of it, nothing after - Upload a File (Image) via your Clipboard (Ctrl-V) - Your 'empty' character will no longer be there
